title: BRIEF-MSC Industrial Q2 Earnings Per Share $2.06
text:
April 10, 2018 / 11:57 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-MSC Industrial Q2 Earnings Per Share $2.06 Reuters Staff 
April 10 (Reuters) - MSC Industrial Direct Co Inc: * SEES Q3 2018 SALES $820 MILLION TO $835 MILLION 
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.31 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q2 SALES $769 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $772 MILLION 
* SEES Q3 2018 AVERAGE DAILY SALES AT MIDPOINT UP ABOUT 7 PERCENT, EXCLUDING DECO 
* SEES Q3 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.37 TO $1.43, INCLUDING AND EXCLUDING DECO 
* AT MIDPOINT, AVERAGE DAILY SALES FOR Q3 ARE EXPECTED TO INCREASE ROUGHLY 11% COMPARED TO LAST YEAR’S Q3 
* EXCLUDING DECO, AVERAGE DAILY SALES AT MIDPOINT FOR Q3 EXPECTED TO INCREASE ROUGHLY 7% COMPARED TO LAST YEAR’S Q3 
* EXCLUDING DECO, CO EXPECTS NET SALES FOR Q3 OF FISCAL 2018 TO BE BETWEEN $789 MILLION AND $803 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
